title: 新约 - 帖撒罗尼迦前书(1 Thessalonians) - 第 5 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 帖撒罗尼迦前书(1 Thessalonians) -- 第 5 章 ( 本篇共有 5 章 )

lineList.en: But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.
lineList.cn: 弟兄们，论到时候日期，不用写信给你们。

lineList.en: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.
lineList.cn: 因为你们自己明明晓得，主的日子来到，好像夜间的贼一样。

lineList.en: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.
lineList.cn: 人正说平安稳妥的时候，灾祸忽然临到他们，如同叁难临到怀胎的妇人一样，他们绝不能逃脱。

lineList.en: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.
lineList.cn: 弟兄们，你们却不在黑暗里，叫那日子临到你们像贼一样。

lineList.en: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.
lineList.cn: 你们都是光明之子，都是白昼之子，我们不是属黑夜的，也不是属幽暗的。

lineList.en: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.
lineList.cn: 所以我们不要睡觉，像别人一样，总要儆醒谨守。

lineList.en: For they that sleep sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.
lineList.cn: 因为睡了的人是在夜间睡。醉了的人是在夜间醉。

lineList.en: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.
lineList.cn: 但我们既然属乎白昼，就应当谨守，把信和爱当作护心镜遮胸。把得救的盼望当作头盔戴上。

lineList.en: For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,
lineList.cn: 因为神不是豫定我们受刑，乃是豫定我们藉着我们主耶稣基督得救。

lineList.en: Who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.
lineList.cn: 他替我们死，叫我们无论醒着睡着，都与他同活。

lineList.en: Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.
lineList.cn: 所以你们该彼此劝慰，互相建立，正如你们素常所行的。

lineList.en: And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;
lineList.cn: 弟兄们，我们劝你们敬重那在你们中间劳苦的人，就是在主里面治理你们，劝戒你们的。

lineList.en: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work's sake. And be at peace among yourselves.
lineList.cn: 又因他们所作的工，用爱心格外尊重他们，你们也要彼此和睦。

lineList.en: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.
lineList.cn: 我们又劝弟兄们，要警戒不守规矩的人。勉励灰心的人。扶助软弱的人。也要向众人忍耐。

lineList.en: See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.
lineList.cn: 你们要谨慎，无论是谁都不可以恶报恶。或是彼此相待，或是待众人，常要追求良善。

lineList.en: Rejoice evermore.
lineList.cn: 要常常喜乐。

lineList.en: Pray without ceasing.
lineList.cn: 不住的祷告。

lineList.en: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.
lineList.cn: 凡事谢恩。因为这是神在基督耶稣里向你们所定的旨意。

lineList.en: Quench not the Spirit.
lineList.cn: 不要销灭圣灵的感动。

lineList.en: Despise not prophesyings.
lineList.cn: 不要藐视先知的讲论。

lineList.en: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.
lineList.cn: 但要凡事察验。善美的要持守。

lineList.en: Abstain from all appearance of evil.
lineList.cn: 各样的恶事要禁戒不作。

lineList.en: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
lineList.cn: 愿赐平安的神，亲自使你们全然成圣。又愿你们的灵，与魂，与身子，得蒙保守，在我主耶稣基督降临的时候，完全无可指摘。

lineList.en: Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.
lineList.cn: 那召你们的本是信实的，他必成就这事。

lineList.en: Brethren, pray for us.
lineList.cn: 请弟兄们为我们祷告。

lineList.en: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.
lineList.cn: 与众弟兄亲嘴问安务要圣洁。

lineList.en: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.
lineList.cn: 我指着主嘱咐你们，要把这信念给众弟兄听。

lineList.en: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
lineList.cn: 愿我主耶稣基督的恩常与你们同在。
